problem: 如图,一条公路修到湖边时,需拐弯绕湖而过,如果第一次拐的角∠A是120°,第二次拐的角∠B是150°,第三次拐的角是∠C,这时的道路恰好和第一次拐弯之前的道路平行,则∠C的大小是()
problem_en: As shown in the figure, when a road is repaired to the lake, it needs to turn around the lake. If the first angle ∠A is N_0, the second angle ∠B is N_1, and the third angle is ∠C , at this time the road is exactly parallel to the road before the first turn, then the size of ∠C is ()
